mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.system FROM ZCJ_SHSNC_RADIOS p WHERE p.system IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.system ASC
SELECT DISTINCT p.value FROM ZCJ_SHSNC_RADIOS p WHERE p.value IS NOT NULL and p.system=#{system} ORDER BY p.value ASC
SELECT DISTINCT p.name FROM ZCJ_SHSNC_RADIOS p WHERE p.name IS NOT NULL and p.value=#{value} ORDER BY p.name ASC
